channel.title: [Animation] Slice by Guillotine
channel.description:
Wow. What a great mind I have. I went from creating a guillotine, to chopping a head off, to making a sinister little scene out of it. hahahahhaha
Basically, the guy tells his friend to run and jump through it. He does. The guy gets hit with a ball and loses control of the handle. The blade falls, and cuts his friend in half :D
If I have time I might actually make a biped for these and render out a nice little movie =]
